ðŸ“– Summary: Termux-Desktop is a shell script designed to easily install and manage Linux desktop environments and window managers within the Termux environment on Android devices. It supports various desktop styles, enables hardware acceleration, and offers options for GUI access via Termux:X11 or VNC, along with package management and containerization capabilities.
